story_22_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
My ideal team... I thought that I’d grown so much
stronger...
story_22_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Don’t let it get to you, Paulo. Each and every
sync pair gave it their all for a truly intense battle.
story_22_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Losing is a consequence of Pokémon battles
sometimes, even if you still give it everything
you’ve got.
story_22_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Accept what has transpired. Face it, and continue
forward. That is the way to grow stronger.
story_22_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
And offer our congratulations to those who have
won: [Name:PlayerNickname ] and [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] team.
story_22_03000/2401_1001_1400_10: Sorry for acting weird. I’m all right now.
story_22_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], you really are strong.
I gave it everything I had, and it still
wasn’t enough.
story_22_03000/2401_1001_1600_10:
You’ll just have to keep battling for both of us!
I’ll be cheering for you!
story_22_03000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Paulo... He kind of looked like he was forcing that
smile. I hope he’s all right...
story_22_03000/2401_1001_1900_10:
I’m sure he was feeling down after his loss...
But there’s nothing we can do. If there’s a winner,
then there’s sure to be a loser, too.
story_22_03000/2401_1001_2000_10:
If even a single thing had gone differently in that
battle, we would’ve ended up as the losers.
story_22_03000/2401_1001_2100_10:
You’re right. It could’ve gone either way.
Paulo really is strong.
story_22_03000/2401_1001_2200_10: For us to have won against Paulo...
story_22_03000/2401_0301_2300_10:
We’ve got to do our best for his
sake, too!
story_22_03000/2401_0401_2400_10: Right! We’ve got to fight even harder than before!
story_22_03000/2401_0302_2500_10: We’re going to win this thing!
story_22_03000/2401_0402_2600_10:
That’s right. We’ve still got some rough road
ahead of us. No matter what strong opponent
we face, we can’t afford to lose.
story_22_03000/2401_1001_2700_10: That’s your duty, as Paulo’s rival.
